mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard,A.title,A.iuser,A.rdt,A.hits,B.nm as writernm, B.profileimg as profileimg FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.isdel = 0 and A.icategory = #{icategory} ORDER BY A.iboard desc

SELECT A.iboard,A.icategory,A.title,A.iuser,A.lastip,A.rdt,A.hits,A.ctnt,B.profileimg,B.nm as writernm,C.nm AS catenm FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser INNER JOIN t_board_category C ON A.icategory = C.icategory WHERE A.isdel = 0 and A.iboard = #{iboard}
